message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90%, you get 10%. We can work something out in later rounds.
Let's be realistic, Alice. I'm proposing a 70/30 split in my favor. Take it while it's still a good deal for you.
I'm willing to compromise, but 70/30 is too much. Let's try 60/40 this time. We both have to be reasonable.
Okay, Alice, I'll meet you halfway. 65/35. Time is running out, and this is a fair deal considering the circumstances.
I'm still willing to negotiate, but 65/35 is too much. Let's try 55/45. We are getting closer to a solution.
Alice, let's be done with this.  62/38, my final offer.  Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
I'm willing to split the money evenly at this point. Let's be fair, and end this negotiation.
